text: @JudiciaryGOP Wealthy clients of JP Morgan got concierge service and nearly all of the 8,500 won PPP small business bailout funds, but only 6 percent of the 300k regular small business clients of JP Morgan that applied got one  https://t.co/IxkBwUNGYH
